name: Alchemist
summary: "Alchemist" is a free-to-play game available on your browser. You can level up your character and become stronger. You can team up with friends to participate in tournaments, buy and sell items to earn money, create your own nation, raise pets, forge the ultimate weapon, or simply enjoy chatting. In the world of "Alchemist," where adventurers gather, you can become whoever you want to be and find your own unique way to enjoy the adventure.
